contact.text1: I love to sing and to play the piano as well as the violin. Let me know if you want to make some music together or if you want me to play at your next event. Contact me at booking@laraamalia.at.
contact.text2: You can also find me on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.
contact.text3: I’m a singer in a vocal ensemble called anders_chor. We like to sing together. Maybe at your next event?
